sentences.en: A figure with four equal sides forming two inner obtuse Angles and two inner acute Angles; a rhombus or lozenge.
sentences.cn: 菱形（物）：一种带有四个等边构成两个内钝角和两个锐角的图形；菱形或菱形物。

sentences.en: An edible flatfish ( Bothas rhombus ) of European waters.
sentences.cn: 菱鲆欧洲水域产的一种可食用的扁鱼 ( 菱鲆鲆属 )

sentences.en: As each rhombus comprises a triangle pointing inwards and one pointing outwards, there is an interplay of effects, operating through the immaculately shaped levels, edges and angles.
sentences.cn: 由于每个菱形组成一个三角形指着向内和向外指着一个，有一个相互作用的影响，通过经营形成完美的水平，边和角。

sentences.en: Ephraim powder, rhombus silk " and see stars KongLan upward . "
sentences.cn: 莲粉飘红, 菱丝 翳 碧,仰见明星空栏.

sentences.en: Exclusive patented rhombus system design with high precision and density and easy to change.
sentences.cn: 所产机台主体构造精心设计,采用特殊、耐久材料制造而成.

sentences.en: Gradually, though, the rhombus was tipped a little more, until 3-1-2-1-3 became 4-2-4, the system with which Brazil won the World Cup in 1958.
sentences.cn: 不过，菱形中场逐渐进一步倾斜，直到31213最后演变成了1958年巴西夺得世界杯时采用的424。

sentences.en: The inverted nine - spot rhombus pattern has two adjustable directions of well array.
sentences.cn: 菱形反九点井网有两个可调的井排方向,是适合于裂缝和砂体方向性明显油藏的最佳井网.

sentences.en: There is a small network of rhombus in tokyo astronomical observatory .
sentences.cn: 在东京天文台有一个小的菱形台网。

sentences.en: This paper introduces a method for camera calibration based on rhombus.
sentences.cn: 给出了一种基于菱形作为平面模板的摄像机标定方法。

words.tran_cn: 菱形的；斜方形的；正交的
菱形的，[数] 斜方六面体的

trans.tran_en: a shape with four equal straight sides, especially one that is not a square
